Title: The Great Comedy

Title: Explosive Force
synopsis: A former soldier is called back into action to stop a terrorist plot.

Title: High Velocity
synopsis: A high-speed chase through the city as a cop tries to bring down a crime syndicate.

Title: Bulletproof
synopsis: An elite team of soldiers must recover a stolen bioweapon.

Title: Red Alert
synopsis: A security expert must thwart a series of bombings in the city.

Title: Deadly Pursuit
synopsis: A detective goes undercover to take down a dangerous gang.

Title: Hostile Territory
synopsis: A rescue mission in enemy territory turns into a fight for survival.

Title: Combat Zone
synopsis: A retired soldier is pulled back into action when his family is kidnapped.

Title: Under Fire
synopsis: A firefight breaks out in a city under siege by criminals.

Title: Vengeance
synopsis: A former assassin seeks revenge against those who betrayed him.

Title: Endgame
synopsis: A mastermind criminal plans a heist that could change the world.

Title: The Last Stand
synopsis: A group of survivors make a final stand against an invading force.

Title: Rogue Agent
synopsis: An agent goes rogue to bring down a corrupt government official.

Title: Code Red
synopsis: In a high-stakes cyberwarfare scenario, a team of elite hackers and operatives must stop a rogue AI from triggering a global catastrophe.

Title: 22 Jump Street
synopsis: Undercover cops Schmidt and Jenko are sent to college to infiltrate a drug ring, but as they delve deeper into the case, their partnership faces new challenges.

Title: Anchorman: The Legend of Ron Burgundy
synopsis: The 1970s male-dominated newsroom of a San Diego TV station is shaken up when the station hires its first female reporter.

Title: Pineapple Express
synopsis: A stoner and his dealer accidentally witness a murder and go on the run from hitmen and corrupt police officers.

Title: Girls Trip
synopsis: Four lifelong friends travel to New Orleans for the annual Essence Festival, where sisterhoods are rekindled, wild sides are rediscovered, and there's enough dancing, drinking, brawling, and romancing to make the Big Easy blush.

Title: Crazy, Stupid, Love
synopsis: A middle-aged husband's life changes dramatically when his wife asks him for a divorce. He seeks to rediscover his manhood with the help of a newfound friend, Jacob, learning to pick up girls at bars.

Title: Knives Out
synopsis: A detective investigates the death of a patriarch of an eccentric, combative family, uncovering hidden motives and multiple suspects.

Title: Wedding Crashers
synopsis: Two friends, John Beckwith and Jeremy Grey, crash weddings to meet and seduce women. They encounter a more significant challenge when John meets and falls for Claire Cleary.

Title: The Wolf of Wall Street
synopsis: Based on the true story of Jordan Belfort, from his rise to a wealthy stock-broker living the high life to his fall involving crime, corruption, and the federal government.

Title: The Hangover
synopsis: Three buddies wake up from a bachelor party in Las Vegas, with no memory of the previous night and the bachelor missing.

Title: Game Night
synopsis: A group of friends who meet regularly for game nights find themselves entangled in a real-life mystery when the shady brother of one of them is seemingly kidnapped by dangerous gangsters.

Title: Easy A
synopsis: A clean-cut high school student relies on the school's rumor mill to advance her social and financial standing.

Title: Elf
synopsis: After inadvertently wreaking havoc on the elf community due to his ungainly size, a man raised as an elf at the North Pole is sent to the U.S. in search of his true identity.

Title: Deadpool
synopsis: A wisecracking mercenary gets experimented on and becomes immortal but ugly, and sets out to track down the man who ruined his looks.

Title: Horrible Bosses
synopsis: Three friends conspire to murder their awful bosses when they realize they are standing in the way of their happiness.

Title: Pitch Perfect
synopsis: Beca, a freshman at Barden University, is cajoled into joining The Bellas, her school's all-girls singing group. Injecting some much-needed energy into their repertoire, The Bellas take on their male rivals in a campus competition.

Title: Jumanji: Welcome to the Jungle
synopsis: Four teenagers are sucked into a magical video game, and the only way they can escape is to work together to finish the game.

Title: Blockers
synopsis: Three parents try to stop their daughters from losing their virginity on prom night.

Title: Jojo Rabbit
synopsis: A young boy in Hitler's army finds out his mother is hiding a Jewish girl in their home.

Title: Palm Springs
synopsis: When carefree Nyles and reluctant maid of honor Sarah have a chance encounter at a Palm Springs wedding, things get complicated as they are unable to escape the venue, themselves, or each other.

Title: Free Guy
synopsis: A bank teller discovers that he's actually an NPC inside a brutal, open-world video game.

Title: Don't Look Up
synopsis: Two low-level astronomers must go on a giant media tour to warn mankind of an approaching comet that will destroy Earth.

Title: The Adam Project
synopsis: A time-traveling pilot teams up with his younger self and his late father to come to terms with his past while saving the future.

Title: Bad Boys for Life
synopsis: Miami detectives Mike Lowrey and Marcus Burnett must face off against a mother-and-son pair of drug lords who wreak vengeful havoc on their city.

Title: Eurovision Song Contest: The Story of Fire Saga
synopsis: When aspiring musicians Lars and Sigrit are given the opportunity to represent their country at the world's biggest song competition, they finally have a chance to prove that any dream worth having is a dream worth fighting for.

Title: Shang-Chi and the Legend of the Ten Rings
synopsis: Shang-Chi must confront the past he thought he left behind when he is drawn into the web of the mysterious Ten Rings organization.

Title: No Time to Die
synopsis: James Bond has left active service. His peace is short-lived when Felix Leiter, an old friend from the CIA, turns up asking for help, leading Bond onto the trail of a mysterious villain armed with dangerous new technology.

Title: The Batman
synopsis: In his second year of fighting crime, Batman uncovers corruption in Gotham City that connects to his own family while facing a serial killer known as the Riddler.

Title: Dune
synopsis: Paul Atreides, a brilliant and gifted young man born into a great destiny beyond his understanding, must travel to the most dangerous planet in the universe to ensure the future of his family and his people.

Title: Top Gun: Maverick
synopsis: After more than thirty years of service as one of the Navy's top aviators, Pete Mitchell is where he belongs, pushing the envelope as a courageous test pilot and dodging the advancement in rank that would ground him.

Title: Black Widow
synopsis: Natasha Romanoff confronts the darker parts of her ledger when a dangerous conspiracy with ties to her past arises.

Title: The Suicide Squad
synopsis: Supervillains Harley Quinn, Bloodsport, Peacemaker, and a collection of nutty cons at Belle Reve prison join the super-secret, super-shady Task Force X as they are dropped off at the remote, enemy-infused island of Corto Maltese.

Title: Venom: Let There Be Carnage
synopsis: Eddie Brock attempts to reignite his career by interviewing serial killer Cletus Kasady, who becomes the host of the symbiote Carnage and escapes prison after a failed execution.

Title: Spider-Man: No Way Home
synopsis: With Spider-Man's identity now revealed, Peter asks Doctor Strange for help. When a spell goes wrong, dangerous foes from other worlds start to appear, forcing Peter to discover what it truly means to be Spider-Man.

Title: The Matrix Resurrections
synopsis: Return to a world of two realities: one, everyday life; the other, what lies behind it.

Title: No Time to Die
synopsis: James Bond has left active service. His peace is short-lived when Felix Leiter, an old friend from the CIA, turns up asking for help, leading Bond onto the trail of a mysterious villain armed with dangerous new technology.

Title: The Batman
synopsis: In his second year of fighting crime, Batman uncovers corruption in Gotham City that connects to his own family while facing a serial killer known as the Riddler.

synopsis: Paul Atreides, a brilliant and gifted young man born into a great destiny beyond his understanding, must travel to the most dangerous planet in the universe to ensure the future of his family and his people.
